overview: During his stay at New Yorkâ€™s Pierre Hotel, David Bowie and cameraman John Dove made a short concept video for a proposed Diamond Dogs film. The video was shot in black and white with a single RCA video camera. It included a title screen, opening credits, and a superimposed Bowie standing among cardboard-cutout people. Although the project was dropped, this demo offers a tantalizing glimpse of what Bowie had planned.
title: Diamond Dogs Demo Video
